open.title: Metrofibre Outage | The Sands & Keylargo Villas
open.description: Metrofibre has informed us of a network outage affecting The Sands & Keylargo Villas, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Metrofibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

open.title: Metrofibre Emergency Maintenance | Sandton, Lonehill, Magaliessig, Paulshof, Douglasdale & Broadacres
open.description: Metrofibre is conducting emergency maintenance in Sandton, Lonehill, Magaliessig, Paulshof, Douglasdale & Broadacres on the 04/04/2025 21:00 to 05/04/2025 10:00 users affected will experience limited to no connectivity during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: Metrofibre are still working to restore services to normal after maintenance overrun this morning.
